n, k = map(int, input().split())
s = input()

print(s[:k-1] + s[k-1].lower() + s[k:])


def string_case(n, k, s):
    return s[:k-1] + s[k-1].lower() + s[k:].upper()


if __name__ == '__main__':
    n, k = map(int, input().split())
    s = input()
    print(string_case(n, k, s))

def string_case(n, k, s):

def string_case(s):
    return s[:k - 1] + s[k - 1].lower() + s[k:]


if __name__ == '__main__':
    n, k = map(int, input().split())
    s = input()
    print(string_case(s))
